Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at State/116th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth and 115th due to street blockage near State/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth and 115th due to street blockage near State/116th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump and #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Marquette/Cornell
ShortDescription: Northbound J14 Jeffery Jump and 26 South Shore Express buses are temp. rerouted via 67th, Stony Island, and Outer Lake Shore Drive near Marquette/Cornell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump and #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Stony Island, and Outer Lake Shore Drive due to, street blockage near Marquette/Cornell.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
